question: What is the meaning of the name Rookyia Is it a good name to have. One of your e mails had Ruqyah meaning Taweez
answer:
QUESTION
Please advise correct spelling and meaning. Assalaamu Alaikum
ANSWER


Share:
Ruqya or Ruqayya both mean to make a Ta?weez.

It is permissible to keep both names.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
